Tyler.Whitaker\u2013McClendon House: The Whitaker–McClendon House is a living history museum located at 806 W. Houston Street, in the city of Tyler, county of Smith in the U.S. state of Texas. The house is also known as the McClendon House, and the Bonner–Whitaker–McClendon House. White House correspondent Sarah McClendon was born and raised in this house.
